data.news_body: In continuation of our letter dated 21 April 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 30(6) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the audio recording of the Conference Call held on 13 May 2022, on the financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and year ended 31 March 2022, is available on the Company's website at https://www.adityabirlacapital.com/investor-relations/quarterly-results.
